cards.rules_text: Create two 1/1 white Angel creature tokens with flying. If a player has 10 or less life, instead create a 5/5 blue Horror creature token, then put five +1/+1 counters on it if a player has 5 or less life.
Return up to three target creature cards with total mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.notes:
prev: With no god to turn to, humanity turned to its creations for guidance.
TBC

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control with power 4 or greater gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever another creature you control with power 4 or greater dies, put two +1/+1 counters on Wasteland Crier.

Lurid Battlemaster has double strike as long as a creature you control died this turn.
{2}{R}{R}, Sacrifice another creature: Lurid Battlemaster deals 2 damage to target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

When Floating Vagrant enters, tap up to one target creature. If you've seen signs this turn, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. [i](You've seen signs if two or more cards types entered your graveyard.)[/i]

When Angelic Dignity enters, create a 1/1 white Angel creature token with flying.
Whenever a creature you control with flying enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control without flying.
Exile target creature. Mill two cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Dias found their supremacy over mortals utter and complete, but this was not what Lamech promised. There was neither fear nor resistance to such power, merely a resigned acceptance.[/i]
cards.notes: prev: With power over creation, Dias began to unravel those mired in the old ways.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Boardwalk Terror or another Horror enters under your control, you may mill three cards.
Boardwalk Terror gets +3/+3 as long as you've seen signs this turn. [i](You've seen signs if two or more cards types entered your graveyard.)[/i]

Empty [i](As this enters, it loses all abilities until your next turn.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.notes: prev:Loneliness is the harshest teacher.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“I have lost. Oh, much I have lost. A child, a lover, a mother. A friend not yet mature breathing out softly in my arms. A mentor whose form imprinted onto me wholly. Yet there is naught to do but continue. I have lost dear youth, and mourn me, for to you I shall become it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Bared Seeker enters, you may have each player discard two cards, then draw a card. If you do, you lose 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Exposed flesh and bone does not make their search any less enthusiastic.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Pestilent Scavenger enters, you may sacrifice an Insect. If you do, each opponent loses 3 life.

Flying
When Absolver of Transgression enters, choose one —
• Target player exiles a card from their hand.
• Exile any number of target cards in exile.
• Exile target permanent with mana value 1.

Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less.
• Brutality's Way deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Brutality's Way deals 5 damage to target player unless they sacrifice a land.
Flying
Destroy target creature if it's tapped or if you've seen signs this turn. [i](You've seen signs if two or more cards types entered your graveyard.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The Dreamer pierced the heart of Her Radiance and man was trusted no longer.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Deathmarch Angel attacks, if defending player has two or more poison counters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking.
Target player loses 7 life. Then that player chooses up to X permanents they control and sacrifices the rest, where X is their life total.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Dias had one recourse to the shackles placed upon them: complete destruction.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Ward—Pay 3 life.

cards.flavor_text: [i]The moon, your thoughts, and the silent world around you.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Deadpit Skitterer enters, choose one —
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
• You draw a card and lose 2 life.
• Deadpit Skitterer deals 1 damage to any target.

When Unaware Fisher enters, look at the top five cards of your library, then you may discard a Horror card. If you do, put one of those cards into your hand, otherwise you may reveal a Horror card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Choose one —
• Counter target spell.
• Return target creature you control to its owner's hand. Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Under Her watchful gaze all is safe.[/i]
cards.notes:
prev: “Belief here makes illusions of reality. But those illusions of godhood have power to alter reality itself...”
prev: In the stillness you can almost imagine nothing there. Nothing in the way.

cards.rules_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]With a faltering form, banishment allows for one last, lonely flight.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Speak not of heresy, for She is watching, yet voicing truth keeps one intact.[/i]

• Target player discards two cards.
